component.name: SeaIce
component.definition: Definition of component type SeaIce required

component.name: SeaIceKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type SeaIceKeyProperties required

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Description of the basic approximations made in the sea ice model.

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: List of sea ice prognostic variables.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used to represent sea ice

parameter.name: Multi-LevelsScheme
parameter.definition: Details for the multi-levels scheme used for sea ice representation.

parameter.name: IceTypesScheme
parameter.definition: Details for the ice types scheme used for sea ice representation.

component.name: SeaIceSpaceConfiguration
component.definition: Definition of component type SeaIceSpaceConfiguration required

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the sea ice model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the of the horizontal grid used for sea ice.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Specify what timestep sea-ice operates on

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step.

component.name: SeaIceThermodynamics
component.definition: Definition of component type SeaIceThermodynamics required

parameter.name: WaterPonds
parameter.definition: Definition of property name WaterPonds required

parameter.name: SurfaceAlbedo
parameter.definition: Details for surface albedo formulation.

parameter.name: NewIceFormation
parameter.definition: Details for the parametrization of new ice formation.

parameter.name: HeatDiffusion
parameter.definition: Specify single layer or multi-layer treatment of snow thermodynamics on sea ice

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Specify which processes are included in the snow thermodynamics scheme

parameter.name: VerticalHeatDiffusion
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of vertical heat diffusion within sea ice

value.name: multi-layer on an irregular vertical grid
multi-layer on a regular vertical grid

parameter.name: NumberOfLayers
parameter.definition: Number of layers used in the multi-layer heat diffusion scheme

parameter.name: OceanToIceBasalHeatFlux
parameter.definition: Specify how the flux of heat from the ocean to the basal ice is calculated

parameter.name: BrineInclusions
parameter.definition: Definition of property name BrineInclusions required

value.name: thermal properties depending on S-T (fixed salinity)
thermal properties depending on S-T (varying salinity)

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Processes required

parameter.name: TransportInThicknessSpace
parameter.definition: Specify method of calculating sea ice thickness

component.name: SeaIceDynamics
component.definition: Definition of component type SeaIceDynamics required

parameter.name: Rheology
parameter.definition: Scheme used to model sea ice rheology

parameter.name: Advection
parameter.definition: Specify which advection scheme is used for sea ice

parameter.name: HorizontalDiscretizationGrid
parameter.definition: Specify on which horizontal grid sea-ice is modelled

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Specify the process by which sea-ice redistribution is modelled

parameter.name: IceStrengthFormulation
parameter.definition: Details for the ice strength formulation.
